title: Modern Europe: Norway
brief_description: Describes the geography of Norway from its mountains 8000 feet above sea level, to its lowland regions and fjords. Norways major industries are tourism, fishing, shipbuilding, agriculture, forestry and iron smelting. Also shows Norways landmarks, buildings of interest and ancient rock carvings. Suitable for secondary level.
